blogPost.excerpt: A collection of premium motion design and illustration resources. Currently, - 20+ character designs & animation rigs - 30 avatars - 100+ props for scene creation (inc. devices & accessibility) - Colour swatches - Roadmap to add 100+ assets of varying themes
blogPost.body: A collection of premium motion design and illustration resources. Currently, - 20+ character designs & animation rigs - 30 avatars - 100+ props for scene creation (inc. devices & accessibility) - Colour swatches - Roadmap to add 100+ assets of varying themes
blogPost.title: Motion Design & Illustration Assets - A collection of animation, illustration & design resources
blogPost.author: Dane Kirkland

localize.description: 一系列优质的动作设计和插画资源。目前，--20+角色设计和动画装备--30个头像--100+场景创建道具（包括设备和无障碍）--颜色样本--增加100+不同主题资产的路线图。
localize.tagline: 动画、插画和设计资源的集合。

localize.description: 一系列優質的動作設計和插畫資源。目前，--20+角色設計和動畫裝備--30個頭像--100+場景創建道具（包括設備和無障礙）--顏色樣本--增加100+不同主題資產的路線圖。
localize.tagline: 動畫、插畫和設計資源的集合。

next.excerpt: Version 2 is now here: In addition to all the typical creative tools you are familiar with, you'll also find a wide collection of hidden tools that help you bring your ideas to life.
next.title: Hidden Tools 2.0 - Discover a wide collection of tools

localize.description: 第2版现在在这里。除了所有你熟悉的典型创意工具之外，你还会发现大量的隐藏工具，帮助你把你的想法变成现实。
第2版現在在這裏。除了所有你熟悉的典型創意工具之外，你還會發現大量的隱藏工具，幫助你把你的想法變成現實。
